document_data.name: Erika
document_data.mainbody:
'''Erika''' was a young woman who became a [[ghost]] haunting [[Harrow Hill]] after being slain by [[Gunter Weiss]] at some point prior to the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Dear Erika is quite displeased by my servants' appearance, but they obey my every wish exactly.|Gunter Weiss, remarking on Erika}}
document_data.Relationships:
In life, she lived with Gunter Weiss, though as he grew more obsessed, she slowly became his prisoner.
